    • Method Detail

      • canAccess

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> canAccess(CanAccessRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: PolicyService
        This method is used to find out if the given user is allowed to access the resource given their justification. This is where any resource level access controls are enforced.
        Specified by:
        canAccess in interface PolicyService
        Parameters:
        request - a CanAccessRequest containing the user requesting the data, the justification of why they want the data and resource containing that data.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture Boolean which is true if they are allowed access to the resource.

      • getPolicy

        public CompletableFuture<MultiPolicy> getPolicy(GetPolicyRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: PolicyService
        This method gets the record level Policy's that apply to the list of resources that the user has requested access too.
        Specified by:
        getPolicy in interface PolicyService
        Parameters:
        request - a GetPolicyRequest containing the user requesting the data, a justification for why they want the data and a list of the resources the user wants access too.
        Returns:
        a MultiPolicy containing the mapping of resource to Policy

      • setPolicy

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> setPolicy(SetPolicyRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: PolicyService
        This method allows for the setting of a policy to a resource.
        Specified by:
        setPolicy in interface PolicyService
        Parameters:
        request - a SetPolicyRequest containing the resource and the policy to set on that resource.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture Boolean which is true if the policy was sucessfully set.
